hero.title: UnAI - Practical Training for Everyday Use of AI
hero.subtitle: Learn how to use artificial intelligence simply, efficiently, and with confidence.

learn.title: What You Will Learn
learn.text: Practical skills you can apply immediately - at home, at work, or in creative projects.
list: How to save time using AI
How to improve writing and communication
How to organize daily tasks and activities
How to express your creativity more effectively
How to work faster and more efficiently
How to build simple AI workflows

collaboration.title: How We Can Work Together
collaboration.intro:
Everyone has different goals, pace, and levels of experience.
UnAI is not a linear course, but a flexible support system.
You can stay at one level or go deeper when it makes sense for you.
collaboration.intro_call_text:
A short 15-minute call to understand your goals and assess how AI can help you.
No obligations.
collaboration.mentoring_text:
Personalized support tailored to your needs.
You can stay at this level as long as it’s useful - with a strong focus on practical application, tools, and real results.
collaboration.group_text: Thematic workshops and group sessions (e.g. prompt engineering) for those who want to learn through shared practice and discussion.
collaboration.masterclass_text:
Advanced topics such as automation, AI workflows, and tools like n8n.
Designed for those who want a deeper, more technical understanding.

programs.title: Choose Your Program
programs.freecall_text: A short call to understand your needs and goals.
programs.mentoring_text: Personalized training: tools, guidance, workflow preparation, and hands-on creation of AI prompts.
programs.group_text: Skills and tools for practical, real-world use of AI.
programs.masterclass_text: Advanced techniques for building AI workflows and automations.

why.title: Why UnAI?
list: Training focused on modern AI tools

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.text: Book a free introductory call and find out if - and how - AI can improve your everyday life.

footer.tagline: Learn to use AI without fear of new technologies.

instructor.name: Miodrag Strak
instructor.title: AI Mentor
instructor.bio: With over 25 years of experience working with public and private universities, international projects, the financial sector, and companies, I operate at the intersection of education, mentoring, and real-world AI implementation. Through long-term mentoring of young people and professionals, I focus on making artificial intelligence understandable, practical, and independently usable. In parallel, I actively design and implement AI systems — from automation pipelines and AI agents to production-ready solutions in real business environments. My approach combines academic insight, mentoring experience, and hands-on AI development.
